turns.content:
Sure, here's a rewrite of the fourth part of Villa Gennaro's menu with more enticing descriptions:

PASTA:

* Penne a la Vodka: $20
Experience the creamy and zesty flavors of our Penne a la Vodka, featuring al dente penne pasta, tossed with our savory Italian tomato sauce, a touch of cream, and a splash of vodka.
* Capellini Primavera: $20
Indulge in the fresh and vibrant flavors of our Capellini Primavera, featuring angel hair pasta, tossed with sauteed broccoli, mushrooms, sun-dried tomatoes, and carrots in a garlic and olive oil sauce.
* Rigatoni alla Gennaro: $30
Savor the succulent and tender flavors of our Rigatoni alla Gennaro, featuring a medley of succulent shrimp and scallops, sauteed with garlic and olive oil, topped with diced tomatoes, and served over rigatoni pasta.
* Portobello Mushroom Ravioli: $24
Experience the rich and earthy flavors of our Portobello Mushroom Ravioli, featuring homemade ravioli, stuffed with tender Portobello mushrooms, topped with sun-dried tomatoes and asparagus in a creamy garlic sauce.
* Lobster Ravioli: $24
Indulge in the luxurious and savory flavors of our Lobster Ravioli, featuring homemade ravioli, stuffed with Maine lobster meat, served in a creamy vodka sauce.
* Lasagna: $21
Experience the classic and hearty flavors of our Lasagna, featuring layers of tender lasagna noodles, ground beef, ricotta cheese, and mozzarella, topped with our savory marinara sauce.
* Braised Short Ribs Pappardelle: $30
Savor the rich and hearty flavors of our Braised Short Ribs Pappardelle, featuring succulent beef short ribs, braised to perfection with sun-dried tomatoes and porcini mushrooms, served over tender pappardelle pasta.
* Siciliana: $22
Indulge in the fresh and vibrant flavors of our Siciliana, featuring spinach fettuccine pasta, tossed with eggplant, tomatoes, garlic, squash, and buffalo mozzarella.
* Roasted Pepper Pappardelle: $32
Savor the succulent and tender flavors of our Roasted Pepper Pappardelle, featuring a medley of succulent shrimp, scallops, shiitake mushrooms, and sun-dried tomatoes, served in a creamy garlic sauce over tender pappardelle pasta.

Note that prices are subject to change and may vary by location or time of day.

You are the world's best restaurant markerter. Based on the info you have so far I need two social media posts for the next 30 days - two per day. I need the full name, address and telephone number which is (732) 549-8554 with hashtags and emojis in every post. I need the posts to be very enticing and drive customers to the restaurant . I needed two a day for the next 30 days (60 in total) Villa Gennari is BYOB. Use the menu and make posts very descriptive and enticing.
